entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
